comment.body:
Even if the above requests does not request any advertisement, the requests are loaded from their advertisement domains and paths.
So, for adblockers, there are no choice to unblock.

---

Not only AdGuard Base filter exists, but also other adblockers' exist, such [EasyList](https://github.com/easylist/easylist) and [uAssets](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets).
Will you request to unblock?

comment.body:
このサイトのアンチ広告ブロックは、DNSフィルタリング有効だと解除できません。お手数ですが、このサイトをみるときはDNSフィルタリングを無効にしてください。そのうえで、現在激しいいたちごっこが続いており、昨日だけで4回更新しております。デフォルトのフィルタ更新間隔は24時間ですので、間隔を短くしていただくか、手動での更新もお試しください。それでもタイミングによってはみられないことがあるかもしれません。以下のルールを追加いただくと、広告は表示されますが画像が見られない機会は減るかもしれません。
`@@||rocketnews24.com^$elemhide`

なお、フィルタはたくさん購読するほどアンチ広告ブロックを惹起しやすくなるため、最小限に絞ることをお勧めいたします。しばしば誤解されますが、Adblock Warning Removal Listはこうしたアンチ広告ブロックとは関係ございません。

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Regarding incorrect blocking - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/135303#issuecomment-1344030461
I suppose that it's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/268
It should be fixed by this rule:
```adblock
nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")
```
from AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, but it doesn't work due to mentioned issue.
Adding this rule:
```adblock
nytimes.com#%#AG_setConstant('Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup', 'noopFunc')
```
to user rules should fixes it.

It happens with 7.12 nightly only.

- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/62734
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/60583
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/62672
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/77943
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/23821
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/22807
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/27854
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/27867
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/28013

### Add your comment and screenshots

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/62734 - The website is dead.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/60583 - Cannot reproduce.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/62672 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/23821 - No such elements found.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с нашими фильтрами и выше опциями антитрекинга - код пришел в смс.
Попробуй оставить для начала только фильтры и с ними проверить сайт. Если проблем не будет, включай опций антитрекинга по одной. Важно, чтобы сторонние фильтры, скрипты, днс были выключены.

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Limit could be extended, but Op states he currently only has two lists active.
iOS sadly treats iframe's requests as the main page, so every rule which targets iframe must be applied to main page too (for iOS)
